title: Second Chances
description:
Seth Morris, Ronda Marwa and Christine share stories about the Kerouac lifestyle, a loved one with dementia, and a friendship that came from a kidney donation.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Funkallisto, Seth Morris, Jack Kerouac, Ronda Marwa, Vampire Weekend, Christine, Belle and Sebastian, Kevin Allison)
